casebody.data:
Annabelle UMBERGER
v.
PIKE CORPORATION, J. Eric Pike, Charles E. Bayless, James R. Helvey III, Peter Pace, Daniel J. Sullivan, James L. Turner, Court Square Capital Partners, Pioneer Parent, Inc., and Pioneer Merger Sub, Inc. No. 37PA16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 8, 2016. Scott M. Tyler, Charlotte, for Pike Corporation. Glenn E. Ketner, III, Charlotte, for Pike Corporation. David G. Schiller, Raleigh, for Umberger, Annabelle, et al. Paul R. Dickinson, Jr., Charlotte, for Lieberg, Collin. Marc Ackerman, for Lieberg, Collin. Richard A. Maniskas, for Lieberg, Collin. Kurt F. Hausler, Charlotte, for Beickert, Edwin. Brian D. Long, for Beickert, Edwin. J. Daniel Albert, for Umberger, Annabelle, et al.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant (Pike Corporation) on the 5th of February 2016 in this matter for discretionary review under G.S. 7A-31 prior to a determination by the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of February 2016."
